messages.using-product-info-content1: While every care has been taken to ensure product information is correct, food products are constantly being reformulated, so ingredients, nutrition content, dietary and allergens may change.  You should always read the product label and not rely solely on the information provided on the website.
messages.using-product-info-content2: If you have any queries, or you'd like advice on any Tesco brand products, please contact Tesco Customer Services, or the product manufacturer if not a Tesco brand product.
messages.using-product-info-content3: Although product information is regularly updated, Tesco is unable to accept liability for any incorrect information. This does not affect your statutory rights.
messages.using-product-info-content4: This information is supplied for personal use only, and may not be reproduced in any way without the prior consent of Tesco Stores Limited nor without due acknowledgement.

ProductType:256093024.title: Tetley 240 Tea Bags 750G
description: Find all your favourites - plus our newest teas at tetley.shop
For the Love of the Planet
Creating the perfect cuppa should also be kind to the planet. So we take care at every stage from crop to cup.
Our factory uses 100% green electricity and sends zero waste-to-landfill.

Not only does every Tetley cuppa taste good - we make sure it does good too. That's why we source our leaves from Rainforest Alliance Certified tea gardens, and why we're working hard with the Ethical Tea Partnership to make life better for the farmers, families and communities that help make our tea.
ProductType:256093024.bulkBuyLimitMessage: You are able to buy a maximum of 25 of this item

returnTo.addressLine2: Got a question brewing or a problem to share?
returnTo.addressLine3: We're all ears, so drop us a line.

marketing: Quality taste has been at the heart of Tetley since 1837 - and it's all those years of expertise that make our tea so full-flavoured and refreshing. Only the best leaves make the grade, and our tea tasters try every blend at least 7 times before it passes the Tetley quality test. Dream job!
storage: Store in a cool, dry place
preparationAndUsage: When it's time for a cuppa, the average Brit leaves the bag in for 1 minute, dunks 3 times and adds a splash of milk. Tetley's tea blenders always boil fresh water and brew for 2-3 minutes before adding milk.
But your perfect brew? That's up to you...
productMarketing: Quality taste has been at the heart of Tetley since 1837 - and it's all those years of expertise that make our tea so full-flavoured and refreshing. Only the best leaves make the grade, and our tea tasters try every blend at least 7 times before it passes the Tetley quality test. Dream job!
features: Full on Taste, Light on Waste

entries.text: Can’t complain, Although the taste is a little weak for my liking. Stockwell brand is a lot cheaper and makes a stronger more flavoursome brew. Miles better if you ask me but wasn’t in stock at the time of purchase so had to get the famous stuff.
The quality is very poor, more like dust than leaves.  I have enjoyed Tetley for over 30 years, but so disappointed past 4-5 months.  Please check quality control.

I am 75% Tea and 25% Man.
Can't Live without a Cuppa.
Tetley is King.

I always used to like this brand of tea. However, having recently bought a 240 packet, I find its quality has changed for the worse, in that it has a very metallic taste. It's as if the whole product has been switched to something inferior!

I'm now finished with this brand. Unfortunately, I now have here a big bag of Tetley tea bags that is destined for the bin.

entries.summary: Far too Dusty, even if it tastes good.
entries.text:
2 Stars is "I don't like it", which is not really true. I have used this brand of tea for years and years, and it has a good taste. 
What I do not like is that the most recent batches we have had are very dusty (or the holes in the bags are bigger). 
At the end of a cup, I have to try to remember not to drain the last mouthful. If I do, I get the fine dusty particles in my throat. 
For convenience we transfer the bags from the soft packs to a small caddy. By the time we get to the bottom, there is always a significant amount of very fine tea dust, that never used to escape the bags.  
So, this week I will be seeking a less dusty alternative.

I've give all the other brands a try but I always come back to Tetley. There's not a big difference between original and decaf which for me means I can swap to decaf without really noticing nearer bed time.

I have used these tea bags (and other known brands for years)
Recently I have become aware of the plastic which is in the tea bag itself. Tetley , as a famous brand name you should be changing this situation as these bags will be around long after most of us.I will no longer purchase Tetley teabags  and will look for a more ecologically sound alternative.
